reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of PHYS 312, MATH 316, MATH 257.
M and W from 6pm - 8pm in ESB 5106
MATH 316 or PHYS 312 to be taken concurrently with EOSC 453.
courseName: Physics of the Earth and Other Planets
description: Identification and quantitative analysis of diverse physical problems in the earth, ocean, atmospheric, and planetary sciences.
